publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3877 Christina McKelvie: Scottish Union Learning Fund—That the Parliament notes and welcomes the participation of Scotland’s trade unions in the education of their members, thereby increasing opportunities to learn, access to learning and training for workers; further notes that much of this effort is channelled through the Scottish Union Learning Fund (SULF), and welcomes the additional funding for the SULF under the current administration.

S3M-3877 Scottish Union Learning Fund (lodged on 6 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Patrick Harvie*, Alasdair Allan*, Robin Harper*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Anne McLaughlin*, Brian Adam*, Stuart McMillan*, Margo MacDonald*, Aileen Campbell*
S3M-3877 Scottish Union Learning Fund (lodged on 6 April 2009) Willie Coffey*, Gil Paterson*
